page.title: 14Cubs and Scouts in Huntley.
page.content: Cubs is held every Tuesday at the Scout H.Q.in Huntley.It starts at 6.15 and finishes about 8.00.In the summer Cubs and Scouts are held on May Hill. The age for Cubs is from eight to eleven,then,if you want,you can go up into Scouts. In Cubs and Scouts you can do a number of things:in Cubs you can cook or do some badge work,such as learning how to read maps.In Scouts you do some of these things,but at a harder level. Scouts is held every Friday in the winter at Huntley and in the summer up on May Hill. The age for Scouts is eleven to fifteen,but after that some become Adventure Scouts.
